subject: College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: A national spring game record crowd of 95,722 came out to watch Terrelle Pryor throw two long touchdown passes in 30 seconds, leading the Gray over the Scarlet, 23-3, at sun-drenched Ohio Stadium in Columbus. The attendance topped the 92,138 Alabama drew for Nick Saban’s coaching debut in 2007.
